name: Basic Research Education and Development Society
briefDescription: To inculcate the thirst for knowledge among students from marginalized sections of the society helping them to achieve their full potential so that the inherent human excellence is brought forth for the good of the individual and the society. To achieve this Mission, mobilize adequate resources and administer them with dedication, efficiency and transparency.To achieve this objective, BREAD Society has been awarding scholarships in Andhra Pradesh to meritorious students from government and aided schools pursuing higher education in government and aided colleges. BREAD Society has now taken up BREAD Library as its Flagship program in place of Scholarships as government of Andhra Pradesh has occupied that space.
